inclusionsList: Daily Transfers in Bus for 6 pax.
3 days excursions in Baku: City Historical tour, Absheron Tour with transfer and english speaking guide
terms: The rooms and rates are subject to availability at the time of booking / confirmation.
Hotel, sightseeing, meals and transfer rate might change with prior email notification.
Date changes after the reservation might affect the final price.
Hotel check-in time is from 14:00 onwards and check-out time is at 12:00.
In case you choose cash payment method upon arrival please confirm your trip dates by sending us the confirmation to info@azerbaijantrips.com.

program.text: Walking sightseeing tour of the “Inner City” (Maiden Tower (XII century), Juma Mosque (XII century), Caravanserai’s(XIV-XV centuries)
Excursion to the museum complex “Shirvanshahs Palace” (XV century)
Walk through the National Park (Boulevard). With this you can see Crystal Hall, National Flag Square, Philharmonic Hall, “Little Venice”, The Museum of Mugam, and The Carpet Museum.
